name: mailgo
description: Electron shell for the Mailgo local email campaign app.

scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,BACKEND,ELECTRON -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:frontend: cross-env PUBLIC_URL=. npm --prefix ../frontend/app run build && node ./scripts/sync-frontend.js
